mapper.select: SELECT U.USERNAME, U.PASSWORD, U.EMAIL FROM TASKCONTROL.USERS AS U
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TASKCONTROL.USERS (USERNAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT U.USERNAME, U.PASSWORD, U.EMAIL FROM TASKCONTROL.USERS AS U INNER JOIN TASKCONTROL.USER_CONTROLS AS UC ON UC.USER_USERNAME = U.USERNAME WHERE UC.CONTROL_NAME = #{controlName,typeHandler=com.qopuir.taskcontrol.mybatis.typeHandlers.ControlNameTypeHandler}
